about_the_game:
■ Champagne Tower with Glasses Filled with Liquid Explosives

The rules of the game are simple: stack more glasses higher.
However, these glasses are filled with liquid explosives.
You know what happens if you knock one over, right?

And don't worry if there's something other than glasses mixed in.

■ $1,000,000 Debt

For each glass you stack, you'll be rewarded $10,000.
This way, you can quickly pay off your $1,000,000 debt.
Of course, any extra amount will be yours to keep.

That is, if you can manage to collect it.

■ Time Limit

This game has a time limit.
However, if you stack the glasses above a certain height, you'll get more time.
Of course, if you can't repay the debt within the time limit, it's game over.

So, which is worse: game over or an explosion?

■ Items

For every certain number of glasses you stack, you can choose a special item.
These items can increase your earnings or prevent glasses from falling, all aiding your progress in the game.

Oh, you don't need those items, do you?
